## audio\_.group.play() method

播放

**Signature:**

```typescript
play(contains_state_n_?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contains\_state\_n\_ | number | _(Optional)_ 包含状态（处于这些状态中的音频将被播放，例：mk.audio\_.state.pause &#124; mk.audio\_.state.stop） |

**Returns:**

void
